      Builds coordinates based on the primitive arguments instead of the datatypes in the constructor.
      CoordinatesWorld CoordinatesWorld.calculateTarget(Angle bearing, double distance)
      Calculates the target coordinates that lie at a given distance and bearing from these coordinates.
      CoordinatesWorld CoordinatesWorld.calculateTarget(CoordinatesDelta delta)
      Calculates the world coordinates the lie at a given offset from these coordinates.
      CoordinatesWorld A_Shape.getReference()
      Gets the reference coordinates.
      CoordinatesWorld A_Shape.getWorldEnd()
      Gets the world coordinates corresponding to the delta coordinates for the end of the path.
      CoordinatesWorld A_Shape.getWorldStart()
      Gets the world coordinates corresponding to the delta coordinates for the start of the path.
      CoordinatesWorld A_Shape.interpolateWorld(double distance, boolean isFromAOrB)
      Interpolates world coordinates along the path.
      CoordinatesWorld CoordinatesWorld.subtract(CoordinatesWorld coordinates)
      Subtracts world coordinates from this one and returns a new one with the difference.
